changeSet.sql: create table if not exists patient_data ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INTEGER NULL REFERENCES patients(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, age INTEGER, gender VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(255), weight NUMERIC(5, 2), height NUMERIC(5, 2), chat_log_id INTEGER REFERENCES chat_logs(id) ON DELETE SET NULL, symptoms TEXT[], created_at timestamp default now(), is_deleted boolean default false NOT NULL );
